description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部直属的唯一一所培养外交外事、国际问题研究和涉外经济、法律复合型人才的文科外语类高等学校，被誉为“中国外交官的摇篮”。
description.en: The only institution of higher learning under the direct administration of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China, which specializes in cultivating versatile talents for diplomatic and foreign affairs, international studies, and foreign-related economics and law. It is known as the 'cradle of Chinese diplomats'.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府的外交主管机关。
description.en: The foreign affairs authority of the government of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国教育部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部
en: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管教育事业和语言文字工作的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees education and language-related work.

description.zh-cn: 中国无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，中国人民解放军的创建者之一。
description.en: A Chinese proletarian revolutionary, politician, military leader, and diplomat. He was one of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and one of the founders of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型全国重点大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research-oriented national key university in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、军事家、外交家、诗人，中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, military leader, diplomat, and poet. He was one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army and one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国际问题研究专家，现任外交学院院长。
description.en: An expert on international studies in China, currently serving as the President of China Foreign Affairs University.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中国驻瑞士大使，现任外交学院党委书记。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat, former Chinese Ambassador to Switzerland, and current Party Secretary of China Foreign Affairs University.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、战略家、理论家、诗人和中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, strategist, theorist, poet, and the main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军高级将领、中华人民共和国外交家。
description.en: A senior general of the Chinese People's Liberation Army and a diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 外交学院建院筹备委员会

zh-cn: 外交学院建院筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国政治活动家，中共优秀党员、战略情报专家。
description.en: A Chinese political activist, an outstanding member of the CCP, and a strategic intelligence expert.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东与中央文化革命小组自上而下动员，在中国大陆境内进行的一场持续十年的政治运动。
description.en: A decade-long political movement in mainland China, initiated and led from the top by Mao Zedong and the Central Cultural Revolution Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，马克思主义者，无产阶级革命家、政治家、军事家、外交家，中国社会主义改革开放和现代化建设的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second-generation central leadership of the Communist Party of China, a Marxist, proletarian revolutionary, politician, military strategist, diplomat, and the chief architect of China's socialist reform and opening-up and modernization.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: One of the former main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 承担全国外交外事人员、国际职员后备人员的培训，以及相关国际交流合作等工作的机构，与外交学院一个机构两块牌子。
description.en: An institution responsible for the training of national diplomatic and foreign affairs personnel, reserve personnel for international organizations, and related international exchange and cooperation. It operates under the 'one institution, two names' model with China Foreign Affairs University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部直属的语言类高等院校，被誉为“共和国外交官摇篮”。
description.en: A language university directly under the administration of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, known as the 'cradle of the Republic's diplomats'.

description.zh-cn: 由外交学院于1965年分出建立的高等学校。
description.en: An institution of higher education established in 1965 after being split from China Foreign Affairs University.

description.zh-cn: 一种学术性活动，学生在其中扮演不同国家的外交官，模拟联合国会议的议事规则，讨论国际热点问题。
description.en: An academic activity in which students role-play as diplomats from different countries, simulating UN conferences to discuss pressing international issues according to the rules of procedure.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性非政府组织，旨在向中国公众传播联合国精神。
description.en: A national non-governmental organization in China aimed at disseminating the spirit of the United Nations to the Chinese public.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官、政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、外交部部长。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat and politician, currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, and Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 前中国中央电视台财经频道著名主播。
description.en: Former prominent anchor for the finance channel of China Central Television.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治家、外交家，曾任联合国第八任秘书长。
description.en: A South Korean politician and diplomat who served as the eighth Secretary-General of the United Nations.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，曾任法国总统。
description.en: A French politician who served as President of France.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物、外交官，曾任美国驻华大使。
description.en: An American politician and diplomat who served as the United States Ambassador to China.

description.zh-cn: 提议在中国人民大学外交系的基础上建立外交学院，并亲自为学院题写校牌，其提出的十六字方针也成为校训。
description.en: Proposed the establishment of China Foreign Affairs University based on the Department of Diplomacy of Renmin University of China, personally wrote the school name, and his sixteen-character principle became the school motto.

description.zh-cn: 批准在中国人民大学外交系基础上筹建外交学院。
description.en: Approved the establishment of China Foreign Affairs University based on the Department of Diplomacy of Renmin University of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 外交学院是中华人民共和国外交部直属高校。
description.en: China Foreign Affairs University is an institution directly under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 外交学院在中国人民大学外交系的基础上建立，其教师队伍大部、全部学生和部分行政管理干部转入外交学院。
description.en: China Foreign Affairs University was established on the basis of the Department of Diplomacy of Renmin University of China, with the majority of its faculty, all of its students, and some administrative staff being transferred to the new university.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 外交学院建院筹备委员会
外交学院建院筹备委员会
外交学院建院筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，外交学院教学工作被迫停止，并最终于1970年1月3日废校。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, teaching at China Foreign Affairs University was forced to stop, and the university was eventually closed on January 3, 1970.

description.zh-cn: 在外交部造反派的压力下，被迫同意停办外交学院。
description.en: Under pressure from the rebel faction of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, he was forced to agree to the closure of China Foreign Affairs University.

description.zh-cn: 收到外交学院老职工请求恢复学院的联名信后，批示李先念考虑此事，推动了学院的恢复。
description.en: After receiving a joint letter from former staff of China Foreign Affairs University requesting its re-establishment, he instructed Li Xiannian to consider the matter, which promoted the university's restoration.

description.zh-cn: 在收到请求恢复外交学院的联名信后，批示“请先念同志考虑”。
description.en: After receiving a joint letter requesting the re-establishment of China Foreign Affairs University, he instructed: 'Please have Comrade Xiannian consider it.'

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 签发《关于同意恢复外交学院的通知》，同意外交学院在原址恢复。
description.en: Issued the 'Notice on Agreeing to the Re-establishment of China Foreign Affairs University', approving the restoration of the university at its original site.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 与教育部决定共建外交学院，在政策、经费、学科建设等方面加大对学院的支持力度。
description.en: Decided to jointly build China Foreign Affairs University with the Ministry of Education, increasing support for the university in terms of policy, funding, and discipline construction.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国教育部

description.zh-cn: 与外交部决定共建外交学院，在政策、经费、学科建设等方面加大对学院的支持力度。
description.en: Decided to jointly build China Foreign Affairs University with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, increasing support for the university in terms of policy, funding, and discipline construction.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交培训学院于外交学院沙河校区成立，与外交学院一个机构两块牌子。
description.en: The China Diplomatic Academy was established at the Shahe Campus of China Foreign Affairs University, operating under the 'one institution, two names' model with the university.

description.zh-cn: 1965年，外交学院原外事干部学校部分分出，建立了国际关系学院。
description.en: In 1965, the part of the former Foreign Affairs Cadre School of China Foreign Affairs University was split off to establish the University of International Relations.

description.zh-cn: 为外交学院沙河校区赠送了“中国外交官的摇篮”的亲笔题词，并出席了周恩来和陈毅铜像的揭幕仪式。
description.en: Presented a personally inscribed piece of calligraphy reading 'The Cradle of Chinese Diplomats' to the Shahe Campus of China Foreign Affairs University and attended the unveiling ceremony of the bronze statues of Zhou Enlai and Chen Yi.

description.zh-cn: 两校学生对“外交官摇篮”称号的归属问题十分敏感，因此多次在网上爆发争执矛盾。
description.en: Students from both universities are very sensitive about the ownership of the title 'cradle of diplomats,' leading to frequent disputes and conflicts online.

description.zh-cn: 外交学院建校初期，曾在原北京外国语学院校舍开课。
description.en: In its early days, China Foreign Affairs University held classes on the campus of the former Beijing Foreign Languages Institute.

description.zh-cn: 举行了第一届模拟联合国大会，是中国大陆第一所举办模拟联合国活动的高校。
description.en: Held its first Model United Nations conference, becoming the first university in mainland China to host a Model UN event.

description.zh-cn: 自2002年起，与中国联合国协会共同主办北京模拟联合国大会和中国模拟联合国大会。
description.en: Since 2002, has co-hosted the Beijing Model United Nations conference and the China National Model United Nations conference with the United Nations Association of China.

description.zh-cn: 在外交学院演讲时，称外交学院是“积极、互动地讨论与中国有关的各项议题的权威论坛”。
description.en: During a speech at China Foreign Affairs University, he called it 'an authoritative forum for active and interactive discussions on various issues related to China'.

description.zh-cn: 在外交学院演讲时，称外交学院是为“中国外交培养最优秀的人才”的高等学校。
description.en: During a speech at China Foreign Affairs University, he referred to it as an institution of higher learning that 'cultivates the most outstanding talents for Chinese diplomacy'.

description.zh-cn: 在外交学院演讲时，称外交学院为“培育外交人才的摇篮”。
description.en: During a speech at China Foreign Affairs University, he called it 'the cradle for cultivating diplomatic talent'.

position.en: Executive Vice President and Party Secretary

description.zh-cn: 1991年5月至1992年4月任代理党委书记。
description.en: Served as Acting Party Secretary from May 1991 to April 1992.
